sessions.inputNotes: Store enum only; no text required.

products.preview: A premium, practical plan to build a peaceful home, align parenting, and raise godly children—without burnout, guilt, or constant conflict.

sessions.title: Family Vision Statement
sessions.prompt: In 2–3 sentences, describe the kind of home you want your children to grow up in (e.g., peaceful, prayerful, disciplined, joyful). Then pick the ONE habit you’ll start this week to move toward that home.
sessions.options: Action options: (A) 10‑min family talk tonight (B) bedtime prayer routine (C) device-free dinner (D) weekly family meeting
sessions.inputNotes: Reflection max 250 chars. Action choice stored. This is the free preview session.
sessions.gamification: Unlock 'Family Builder' badge + start 'Home Harmony' streak (1/3).
sessions.monetizationRationale: Free preview demonstrates value and sets a tangible action; premium unlock continues alignment + discipline toolkit.
sessions.storeInferLogic: Store: reflection length, selected action option. Infer: parenting priority tag (rhythm/communication/boundaries/spiritual).
sessions.recommendationRules: If bedtime prayer selected → recommend Faith & Spiritual Unity. If device-free dinner → recommend Boundaries & Responsibility.
sessions.postSessionCheckin: Did you do the habit? Yes/No + Confidence (1–5).

sessions.title: Parenting Styles Mirror
sessions.prompt: Which statement best describes your default parenting style under stress? Choose one, then write one sentence about what you learned about yourself.
sessions.options: (A) I become strict and controlling (B) I withdraw or avoid conflict (C) I negotiate too much and lose authority (D) I stay calm but firm
sessions.inputNotes: Reflection max 150 chars.
sessions.gamification: Earn 'Self-Aware Parent' badge + streak 2/3.
sessions.monetizationRationale: High-value insight: helps users understand triggers & patterns; worth paying for because it changes daily behavior.
sessions.storeInferLogic: Store: selected style. Infer: risk tags (harsh/avoidant/permissive/steady).
sessions.recommendationRules: If harsh/permissive → recommend Emotional Safety. If avoidant → recommend Conflict Repair.
sessions.postSessionCheckin: How often did you catch this style this week? (Never/1–2 times/Many times).

sessions.title: Discipline Without Damage
sessions.prompt: Think of a recent moment you corrected your child. Choose the discipline approach you typically use, then select one healthier alternative you’ll try next time.
sessions.options: Current: (A) shout/threaten (B) silent treatment (C) repeated warnings (D) calm consequence | Alternative: (1) clear consequence + calm tone (2) reset + reconnect (3) empathy + boundary (4) timeout for parent first
sessions.inputNotes: Pick 1 current + 1 alternative.
sessions.gamification: Unlock 'Gentle Authority' badge + unlock Session 4.
sessions.monetizationRationale: Premium discipline toolkit; actionable behavior change with clear alternatives.
sessions.storeInferLogic: Store: current + alternative. Infer: escalation risk.
sessions.recommendationRules: If shout → recommend Emotional Safety + Repair package. If silent treatment → recommend Conflict Repair.
sessions.postSessionCheckin: Did you try the alternative? Yes/No + Barrier (time/stress/partner disagreement/child behavior).

sessions.title: Parenting Unity Check
sessions.prompt: Where do you and your spouse most disagree about parenting? Pick the top area, then choose a script you’ll use to start a calm conversation today.
sessions.options: Area: (A) discipline (B) screen time (C) respect/attitude (D) faith routines | Script: (1) 'Can we agree on one rule for…?' (2) 'I want to be on the same team—what matters most to you?' (3) 'Let’s choose one consequence we both enforce.'
sessions.inputNotes: Solo user commits to script.
sessions.gamification: Unlock 'Same Team' badge; progress 4/12.
sessions.monetizationRationale: Unity reduces conflict and improves kids’ stability.
sessions.storeInferLogic: Store: area + script. Infer: alignment gap tag.
sessions.recommendationRules: If discipline/screen → recommend Roles & Expectations. If faith routines → recommend Faith & Spiritual Unity.
sessions.postSessionCheckin: Did you have the talk? Yes/No + Outcome (better/neutral/worse).

sessions.inputNotes: Store schedule time; reminders optional.
sessions.gamification: Unlock 'Home Altar' badge + weekly rhythm streak.
